footnotes: H'a Mim:- Imeanza Sura hii kwa baadhi ya harufi za kutamkwa kama ilivyo ada ya Qur'ani katika kuanzishia Sura nyingi kwa harufi kama hizi.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
